name: Apple Veterans and Military Purchase Program
description: 10% discount on Mac, iPad, and accessories for verified military and veterans
fullDescription: Apple offers a 10% discount for current and veteran members of the US Military, National Guard, and Reserve. Discount also extends to immediate family members in the same household.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% discount on Mac computers
- 10% discount on iPad
- 10% discount on accessories
- Same warranty and service as regular purchases
- Available to eligible family members in same household
howToGetIt:
1. Visit Apple's Veterans and Military store online
2. Sign in with ID.me verification
3. Verify military or veteran status
4. Access exclusive 10% pricing
5. Purchase with standard Apple checkout (Apple Card Monthly Installments not available)
